title: Eon - Future Strategy Launch
description:
We were contracted by Eon Next to help launching a new strategy to  78,000 people.

As part of this we  created an engaging and emotive film that reflected the passion, opinions and perspectives of E.ON’s colleagues and customers. Using authentic, honest and humorous interviews, shot in real home and work environments, the films had maximum relatability and impact.

We also created line manager led activities designed to draw out the practical actions each individual can make in order to drive the development of the business in the future. Teams were asked to celebrate and share their past achievements and drive excitement about the future possibilities.

In just three weeks, 90% of the audience had engaged with the hero content and completed the activities with their line manager. 94% agreed that they had a clear understanding of E.ON’s strategic direction.

title: Meta - OCP Event
description: Meta developed several interactive experiences to showcase their latest hardware designs at the Open Compute Project. These included large touchscreens, a quiz, a schedule, a web/VR/Google Cardboard 360 environment, and an augmented reality experience. Meta also provided an A5 booklet with QR codes to trigger the AR experience at home. These interactive experiences successfully showcased Meta's latest hardware designs in an engaging and immersive way, extending the reach of the event.

title: Dell - Virtual Escape Room
description:
We designed and developed a virtual escape room for Dell to educate users on cyber security through a 3D model and VR/Web experience. The escape room consisted of 5 activities and a quiz, with an AI avatar setting the scene. The VR version was used at a global tour and the web version was available for remote events and as a takeaway.

We also created a VR headset guide to help local teams use the technology. Metrics helped Dell understand the popularity and impact of the game on their brand reputation.

title: Learning Lounge
description:
Grabbing people's attention is becoming more and more difficult when it comes to virtual and blended learning. People need their attentional filters stimulated as much as possible in order for them to truly immerse themselves in learning skills and knowledge for developing behaviours.

That is why we have created our Learning Lounge, an interactive and engaging virtual learning hub experience that will revolutionise the way you deliver blended and virtual learning. With prebuilt tools, including Gamification, Videos and discussion prompts participants embark on a modular learning journey that guides them towards hitting specific learning and performance outcomes.

Our functionality means you can amend and utilise the learning and engagement data to dial up the experience and influence facilitated discussions. Our Learning Lounge is a place where blended, virtual and facilitated learning is brought to life through exciting, new and innovative ways. We are passionate about building human centric, innovative learning, and this tool is the perfect way to help businesses transform their performance through their people.

title: 360 Experiences
description:
Our 360 degree virtual reality and Web experiences can be the perfect digital solution for transporting people into new or specific locations. Whilst there, they can learn valuable skills about your culture, your people, your strategy, your business, your brand. So whether you want an immersive event or a new and excited way to share product knowledge or a service, perhaps you want a more effective way to onboard or attract talent, or want an experience that enables your people to truly connect to what they a 360 experience can be the difference that makes the difference.

Putting the controls in the hands of the user allows us to immerse participants in environments that provide an opportunity to guide them towards specific points of information and purpose driven activity. Using 360 degree cameras, we capture environments and build interactive experiences utilising multimedia functionality. This provides us with the freedom to gamify and engage users, depending on the requirement in a way that traditional training and engagement methods simply cannot match.
